page.title: 10Lindsey Allen's weekend-9yrs
page.content: On{Friday}when I got home I fed the ducks with bread, lettuce, mixed corn and mash.Then I played at schools. Hannah came at 4.45. She pretended to be the teacher and I got a smack for talking in lessons. At{6.00}I had{tea. I had tomato soup, horseshoe surprise, chips and a cup of coffee. After that I watched T.V. After that I went round to see my Grandad. I had a cup of tea and a biscuit.We got back at{9.45 pm and I went to bed. On{Saturday}morning I got up at{10.30 and went to town with Kerry to buy new shorts.At{1.30pm}we had sausages and mashed potatoes for dinner. After my dinner I phoned Jennifer to see if her Mum would bring her around in the car. Later we went to the shop to buy some stamps for some letters I had to post. We thought Jennifer had lost one of the letters _ I nearly murdered her!
